5A1F4B4A.Line1.6D03F: Don’t tell me you were meddling in the Horadric Vault. I put a seal on his quarters for a reason.

8E083E4E.Line5.6D03F: I gave him an ultimatum: stop, or leave the Horadrim. You know the rest.

C928B177.VoiceDir1.6D03F: Hint of anger, this is a touchy subject

F413C4CC.Line3.6D03F: The fool thought he could use their power against the Prime Evils. Fight fire with fire.

FB3FFC35.MenuLabel: “Elias summoned demons long before this, didn’t he?”
